nodes.text: Star Wars Rebels: Team Tactics was a free online Star Wars Rebels browser game developed by Disney Interactive. The game was released on Disney.co.uk on October 14, 2015 and loosely adapts events from Star Wars Rebels: The Siege of Lothal.
As Darth Vader claws a tighter grip on the galaxy, help the Rebels complete missions and gain tokens to use in the Star Wars Arcade.
Star Wars: Team Tactics on Disney.co.uk
